name: Inbetween Land
summary: Your friend, Mary, disappears and it's up to you to save her. Uncover an exotic land with unearthly secrets as you find and help your friend leave the flying island.
info:
• 中文名: 迷失之地
  • 别名: 空中之岛
  • 平台: iOS, MAC
  • 游戏类型: adventure
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2013.4.18
  • 售价: ￥45
  • 制作公司: G5 Games
